mapper.insert: insert into user_income (id, user_id, envent_id, amout, source_amount, state, envent_name, create_time, event_user_id, income_type) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{enventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{amout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sourceAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{enventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eventUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{incomeType,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update user_income
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
envent_id = #{enventId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
amout = #{amout,jdbcType=INTEGER},
source_amount = #{sourceAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT},
envent_name = #{enventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
event_user_id = #{eventUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
income_type = #{incomeType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
income_date= #{incomeDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_income
envent_id = #{enventId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
amout = #{amout,jdbcType=INTEGER},
source_amount = #{sourceAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
envent_name = #{enventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
event_user_id = #{eventUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
income_type = #{incomeType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
state = #{afterState,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and income_date= #{incomeDate,jdbcType=DATE} and state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}

update user_income set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, envent_id = #{enventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, amout = #{amout,jdbcType=INTEGER}, source_amount = #{sourceAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, envent_name = #{enventName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, event_user_id = #{eventUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, income_type = #{incomeType,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT ui.id as id, ui.user_id as incomeUserId, ui.create_time as date, ui.create_time as time, ui.event_user_id as eventUserId, ui.amout as amount FROM user_income ui WHERE ui.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND ui.amout > 0 AND DATE_FORMAT(ui.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{createTime} limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pagesize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
